Trade/Device Name(s): VALIDATE® THY Calibration Verification Test Set
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VALIDATE® THY Calibration Verification Test Set for use in calibration verification, linearity, and reportable range verification of thyroid-related analytes in chemistry systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro diagnostic use in quantitative determination of linearity, calibration verification, and reportable range verification for triiodothyronine (T3), thyroxine (T4), human thyroid stimulating hormone (TSH), cortisol, and free T4 in automated, semi-automated, and manual chemistry systems
